name: Mastech Digital, Inc.
description: Mastech Digital, Inc. is a digital transformation services provider based in the United States, specializing in IT staffing and digital services. Founded in 1986, the company has evolved to meet the changing demands of the technology landscape, focusing on delivering innovative solutions to clients across various industries. Mastech Digital operates primarily in two segments: IT Staffing Services and Digital Transformation Services. Their IT staffing services include providing skilled IT professionals to organizations, ensuring that companies have access to the talent needed to drive their projects forward. In the realm of digital transformation, Mastech Digital offers services that encompass data analytics, cloud computing, and enterprise application services, helping businesses leverage technology to enhance operational efficiency and drive growth. The company prides itself on its ability to adapt to technological advancements and the needs of its clients, making it a trusted partner in the journey towards digital transformation. With a strong emphasis on quality and customer satisfaction, Mastech Digital continues to expand its capabilities and client base, positioning itself as a key player in the IT services industry.

seo.meta_title: Mastech Digital, Inc. | IT Staffing and Digital Transformation Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Mastech Digital, Inc., a leader in IT staffing and digital transformation services. Discover how Mastech helps businesses thrive in the digital age.

faq.question: What services does Mastech Digital offer?
faq.answer: Mastech Digital offers IT staffing services and digital transformation services, including data analytics and cloud solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Mastech Digital?
faq.answer: Kaleem Shah is the CEO of Mastech Digital, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Mastech Digital headquartered?
faq.answer: Mastech Digital is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA.
